pref.name: Use symbols in documents
pref.tooltip: Switch symbol support (i.e. use and display of mathematical symbols) in documents on or off.

pref.name: Use symbol shortcuts while typing
pref.tooltip: Auto-convert symbol-shortcuts into symbols when typing.

pref.name: Use symbols for prover output
pref.tooltip: Whether mathematical symbols should be displayed in prover output or not.

pref.name: Prover response time-out
pref.tooltip: Time limit (in milliseconds) for the prover to issue some response to each command; 0 for no limit

pref.name: Gather prover knowledge
pref.tooltip: Automatically gather knowledge about the proof environment for tooltips. Disable on a slow machine.

pref.name: Allow editing of processed text
pref.tooltip: Allow editing of locked regions. Breaks command boundaries and may cause loss of synchronisation!

pref.name: Help URL
pref.tooltip: URL of the help site for Proof General
pref.description: Visit this site for more information about Proof General Eclipse

pref.name: Bug Report URL
pref.tooltip: URL of the bug reporting site for Proof General
pref.description: Visit this site to report a bug in Proof General
